statements: SELECT * FROM EnergyUsage WHERE id = 1;
SELECT timestamp, energy_consumed FROM EnergyUsage WHERE energy_consumed > 100;
SELECT id, timestamp, energy_consumed FROM EnergyUsage WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM EnergyUsage ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, energy_consumed, timestamp FROM EnergyUsage WHERE energy_consumed < 50 ORDER BY energy_consumed ASC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyUsage WHERE energy_consumed > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, timestamp, energy_consumed FROM EnergyUsage WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY energy_consumed ASC;
SELECT id, timestamp, energy_consumed FROM EnergyUsage WHERE energy_consumed <= 50 OR timestamp < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT AVG(energy_consumed) AS avg_energy_consumed FROM EnergyUsage WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-01' GROUP BY MONTH(timestamp);
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM EnergyUsage WHERE energy_consumed > 200;
SELECT * FROM EnergyUsage;
SELECT meter_id, energy_usage, date FROM EnergyUsage;
SELECT date, energy_usage, meter_id FROM EnergyUsage WHERE meter_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM GridOperations;
SELECT operation_name, operation_date FROM GridOperations WHERE operation_type = 'maintenance';
SELECT * FROM EnergyUsage WHERE energy_usage > 100 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT date, SUM(energy_usage) AS total_usage FROM EnergyUsage GROUP BY date HAVING total_usage > 500 ORDER BY total_usage DESC
SELECT meter_id, DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date FROM EnergyUsage WHERE meter_id = 5
SELECT operation_name, COUNT(operation_id) AS operation_count FROM GridOperations GROUP BY operation_name HAVING operation_count > 2 ORDER BY operation_count ASC
SELECT * FROM EnergyUsage INNER JOIN GridOperations ON EnergyUsage.date = GridOperations.operation_date WHERE operation_type = 'maintenance'
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption;
SELECT id, timestamp, energy_usage FROM EnergyConsumption ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM GridOperations WHERE operation_status = 'Successful';
SELECT id, operation_type FROM GridOperations WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, timestamp, optimization_type FROM GridOptimization ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption ORDER BY energy_usage DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT MAX(energy_usage) AS max_energy_usage, MIN(energy_usage) AS min_energy_usage FROM EnergyConsumption;
SELECT id, timestamp FROM GridOperations WHERE operation_status = 'completed' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(energy_usage) AS avg_energy_usage, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, optimization_type FROM GridOptimization WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM energy_usage ORDER BY usage_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT operation_type, operation_date FROM grid_operations WHERE operation_date >= '2021-01-01' AND operation_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT meter_type, manufacturer FROM meter_info WHERE installation_date < '2020-01-01';
SELECT usage_amount AS total_amount FROM energy_usage WHERE meter_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM energy_usage ORDER BY usage_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, address, phone_number FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT operation_type, operation_date, operation_details FROM grid_operations WHERE operation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT meter_id, meter_type, installation_date FROM meter_info WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Corp' ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT usage_date, SUM(usage_amount) AS total_usage FROM energy_usage GROUP BY usage_date ORDER BY total_usage DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption
SELECT meter_id, timestamp, energy_used FROM MeterLocation WHERE city = 'New York'
SELECT operation_name, start_time, end_time FROM GridOperations ORDER BY start_time DESC
SELECT asset_id, asset_type, MeterLocation.latitude, MeterLocation.longitude FROM GridAssets JOIN MeterLocation ON GridAssets.location_id = MeterLocation.meter_id
SELECT outage_id, start_time, affected_area FROM Outages WHERE start_time >= '2022-01-01' AND end_time <= '2022-01-31'
SELECT energy_used, timestamp FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE meter_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM MeterLocation WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY latitude DESC;
SELECT MAX(energy_used), AVG(energy_used) FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT GridAssets.asset_type, GridAssets.location_id, MeterLocation.city FROM GridAssets JOIN MeterLocation ON GridAssets.location_id = MeterLocation.meter_id;
SELECT outage_id, affected_area, TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, start_time, end_time) AS outage_duration FROM Outages WHERE outage_id > 100 ORDER BY outage_duration DESC;
